creator: mcnelson@mindspring.com
text:
It simply does not work!  Here is what happens:

1 New installation using the msi tool.

2 Start the server in console - the console remains open, no messages.

3 Try to browse http://127.0.0.1/

4 Browser says "Cannot find server"

5 No error messages whatsoever.

Note carefully: I just ran apache from my old cygwin distribution. It worked 
fine. The machine was rebooted in between.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
I don't see a bug here. Please address such questions to a user support forum.
See <http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/faq/support.html> for a list of possible
places.

Thanks.
